about.age: years old visual and digital system designer and design researcher, intersecting a human centered approach and new technologies from Munich based in Milan.

projects.Title: Energyoo
projects.description: Branding for a startup focused on sustainable, interchangeable batteries.

projects.Title: By.it
projects.description: E-commerce site for discontinued products, accessible in dark mode only in the evening, revealing secrets and stories about the products.

projects.Title: RawScenarios
projects.description: Website for the exhibition “Raw Scenarios: Reflection on Human Overconsumption” at Dotdotdot, informing visitors and archiving the projects displayed.

projects.Title: Cinema and Photography
projects.description: Two editorial books explore cinema and photography: one dedicated to John Heartfield, pioneer of Dadaist political photomontage, and the other to “Emak Bakia” by Man Ray, a key work of surrealist cinema.

projects.Title: Neptuna
projects.description: Neptuna is a speculative design thesis project that addresses the issues surrounding tuna production in the context of climate change. Through ironic and symbolic snacks and a slow distribution experience, it invites reflection on the environmental costs of consumer choices

projects.Title: Cremona Luthier
projects.description: Complete rebranding of the traditional violin craftsmanship in Cremona, an intangible UNESCO heritage. From the logo to visual communication, including wayfinding, social media, and merchandise, the project creates a cohesive and recognizable identity.

projects.Title: Milan Metro Map
projects.description: I contributed to the concept for the new Milan metro map for 100km Studio, redesigned with a layout that combines a central geographic area and schematic outer zones for the stations. @100km Studio

projects.Title: 100km Studio
projects.description: At Studio 100km, I collaborated with Luigi Farrauto to update the website, refreshing its look and projects. @100km Studio

projects.Title: Anatomy of the Orchestra
projects.description: Website dedicated to the structure of an orchestra and its elements.

projects.Title: Representation of the Absence and Essence of Blackness
projects.description: A visual essay book that explores the shades of black, from its scientific composition to the deep emotions of artists, giving voice to their inner states through typography.

projects.Title: The Passenger
projects.description: I contributed to the creation of the maps for The Passenger Alps and London.

projects.Title: Design Spaziale Italiano
projects.description: I contributed to developing the website for the visual identity of Italian spatial design.

projects.Title: Kinesis
projects.description: The editorial project is structured as a series of magazines entirely dedicated to analog and digital kinetic art. Each issue offers a dynamic experience, exploring works, artists, movements, and technologies of this artistic expression.

projects.Title: Emergency department of Lodi
projects.description: At Studio 100km, I contributed with Luigi Farrauto to the restyling of the wayfinding system for the emergency department di Lodi in Italy, enhancing it's clarity and accessibility through redesigned icons and signage.

projects.Title: Oscar Display Variable
projects.description: Oscar Display is a variable typeface built on a square foundation with rounded corners, expanding across nine weights from thin to black. shifting between upright, italic at 17°, and slanted at 34°, it moves within strict geometry while bending toward motion. a system of glyphs that stretches and contracts, carrying rhythm through form.
